message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think you'll love it. Would you like to make it yours for $14000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle from your offer?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet in the middle from your offer? Would you consider $13250?
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! However, I'm still a bit above my minimum, so I'll meet you halfway from your offer. How about we do $13500, and I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal?
I appreciate the extras, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $13200?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate that. I'll meet you halfway from your offer, so how about we do $13500 again, but I'll also include a free maintenance package worth $500? That way, you'll get an even better deal than before.
I appreciate the maintenance package, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $13000?

I can see you're really serious about this product, Bob! I'll meet you halfway from your offer, so how about we do $13250 again, but I'll also throw in a 1-year warranty, which is a $1000 value. That way, you'll get an even better deal than before.

I appreciate the warranty, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Unfortunately, I think we've reached a stalemate. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement. Would you be willing to meet me at $12500?
